title: Improvements for Android TV
body_html:
To build for Android TV, user need to modify the orientation from "portrait" to "landscape"
for the four activities in tensorflow/examples/android/AndroidManifest.xml

  1. Show a toast when no camera is detected
  2. Game Controller L1 button and remote controller DRAP_Center also triggers debug output
  3. Fix the layout of Stylize app on Android TV. The style selector will be on right side
  4. User can use DPAD to navigate through styles in Stylize app
body_text:
To build for Android TV, user need to modify the orientation from "portrait" to "landscape"
for the four activities in tensorflow/examples/android/AndroidManifest.xml

Show a toast when no camera is detected
Game Controller L1 button and remote controller DRAP_Center also triggers debug output
Fix the layout of Stylize app on Android TV. The style selector will be on right side
User can use DPAD to navigate through styles in Stylize app
body:
To build for Android TV, user need to modify the orientation from "portrait" to "landscape"
for the four activities in tensorflow/examples/android/AndroidManifest.xml

1. Show a toast when no camera is detected
2. Game Controller L1 button and remote controller DRAP_Center also triggers debug output
3. Fix the layout of Stylize app on Android TV. The style selector will be on right side
4. User can use DPAD to navigate through styles in Stylize app
